Thanks, but since this one already needed a dual-layer DVD, why not include Office 2013 x64 too with it?!

And you mentioned that *NO* unattended settings were added? Why not make it unattended and auto-crack the windows (and office, if you wish to add it)

Since this is NOT an untouched release, why not touch it a little more to perfection?!
DISAGREE THE PERSON ABOVE! CONTINUE THIS SO FINE! CAN BE SURE THAT WOULD mess! WE MAY NOT REQUIRE A LOT!

It works great, no complaints, and looks awesome.

BUT!

It says its not verified - what to do?

shah that's not what an unattended file does. What an unattended file does is automate the setup CHOICES. It does nothing for the setup installed files.

I've already automated the activation in the KMS-Activated index. I leave the other one for people who don't wish to use KMS Server Service.

As for the Office requests... I'm already working on some re-issues of the +office2013 versions. Most notably I'm starting a new series, Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 + Office 2013.

I'm working on that now. I plan on doing a plain-jane win7ultsp1 after that, then win8+office re-visited versions of enterprise+office.

Once all that is behind me I'll do the AIO versions. I really try to make sure that every single thing I can think of has been working flawlessly before doing AIO versions as they take much more time to integrate and test.

Anyway... gotta get back to it...

It's very simple. The normal index is not activated. The KMS-Activated index IS activated. Seriously, use your brains people.
Activation of 6 months!

Everything installed and works perfectly with the exception of IE 10. It will only open full screen in the start screen but if I try to open from the Desktop (window mode) it will try to open and then crash and close. Anyone else notice this? I've tried uninstalling and re-installing with no luck.
forcehelo that happens when  your video drivers are being updated and you don't reboot...
quraj, it's 6 months at a time, but it will auto-renew itself every 7 days.... you'll never get to 0.

Please help me for i'm totally lost..
